content: X-C B4 MX Concrete nails (collated) Premium collated nails for fastening to concrete and other base materials using the BX 4 cordless nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Premium nail for excellent performance on soft concrete Everyday fastening solution with cut-tip nail Applications Fastening to soft concrete Fastening to solid masonry Fastening to filled block The following nails are only compatible with the M30L magazine (#2431981): X-C 32 B4 and X-C 39 B4 The following nails are only compatible with the M30XL magazine (#2431818): X-C 45 B4 ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 2-3/8 in Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 2-3/8 in | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Fastener shank diameter | 1/8 in | For use with (tools) | BX 4 | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2361658 - Concrete nail X-C 20 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc - 3922900 - 1/2 pallet BULK 96K X-C 20 B4 MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 96000x Concrete nail X-C 20 MX B4 - 2361659 - Concrete nail X-C 27 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc - 2361660 - Concrete nail X-C 32 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc - 2361661 - Concrete nail X-C 39 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc
